relevance_explanation: The trimmed routine only includes the steps relevant to the customer, who has a suspended account. All other branches and steps have been correctly removed.
completeness_explanation: The logic for a suspended account is present, the routine has been correctly trimmed up to the `complete_case(customer_id)` tool call when the account status is suspended. However, the get provider phone number api call returns an actual phone number but the routine does not share the number with the customer. It states [phone] but never provides the real number to the customer. This step is missing.
